snippet.title: Battalion: Nemesis - Secret HALO Mission Walkthrough
snippet.description:
This is a video of me, Tasselfoot, beating the secret HALO mission of Battalion Nemesis.  To gain access to the mission, beat ANY other mission.  The trick to the mission is the positioning of your guys and being able to heal at least once.

This secret mission unlocks the Halo Wars ticket on Kongregate, so definitely register and play it there.  You could win a free copy of Halo Wars or an XBox 360!

Game: http://www.kongregate.com/games/urbansquall/battalion-nemesis/?referrer=Tasselfoot

Music is Disconnected by Inspector K.  http://www.kyle-ward.com
